attributes.action: Sack Dawn Primarolo, the Paymaster General for abusing her powers with the VAT system and illegally applying draconian extended verification measures to innocent businesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Paymaster General is targeting businesses and closing down their ability to undertake tax schemes. The point of these schemes are to balance the economy and retain our intelligent entrepreneurs in the UK. Dawn Primarolo is also abusing her powers with the VAT system and illegally applying draconian extended verification measures to innocent businesses and driving them into liquidation
